name: BellBoy, Save the Balls!
description:
Save the balls that have the same color as BellBoy

Move BellBoy with mouse or finger across the screen

Dodge the balls that have a different color

Avoid getting hit or is over.

REFERENCES:
All music is from: https://jdsherbert.itch.io/minigame-music-pack/
GUI assets from:https://swapnilrane24.itch.io/hyper-casual-ui-free/
Face of BellBoy from: https://pngtree.com/so/big
Voice of Bellboy: Dmend
Font: GDevelop Asset Store Fonts - Kenny
Balls / Background: GDevelop Asset Store 
Buttons: GDevelop premade object buttons
